Package model.assignments_categories

Package assignments_categories defines objects and operations that are part of Grader tool user's workplace.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assignment
    Assignment contains a name, a weight, a gradeType, and a set of statistics along with methods to change these fields
    AssignmentDB  
    Category
    A category is a way for a teacher to group different assignments.
    CategoryContainer
    Container that holds a reference to the top category which is essentially a Tree data structure of sub categories and assignments.
    DueDate
    The DueDate class creates a GregorianCalendar type date.
    Grade
    Grade contains a Course, an Assignment, a Date, and a Score, along with methods available to change this data
    Stats
    The stats class is a way to hold multiple statistics for an assignment.

Package model.assignments_categories Description

Package assignments_categories defines objects and operations that are part of Grader tool user's workplace. There are operation to add, edit, and delete category of assignments and assignments to the spreadsheet of the course as specified in section 2.4. Additionally, there are operations that handle the electronic turn in option for the assignments. Furthermore, it provides operations to specify different color for different ranges of grades.
